author: Emmanuel Ocbazghi
title: How to treat mild symptoms from home
description: The novel coronavirus is still spreading, but 80% of confirmed COVID-19 cases are considered "mild." Mild cases can still be painful, and there are ways to mitigate your symptoms from home. For the latest case total, death toll, and travel information, see Bu…
content:
